name: Good Baseball Rough Draft
description:
This was a short project I worked on to vent my frustrations at baseball games' boring batting/pitching mechanics.

Everyone - EVERYONE - loves injected QTEs.

Press the arrow key that shows up when the pitch dramatically stops in mid-air.

If you've input them all correctly, press SPACEBAR when the ball gets in the STRIKE-ZONE.

If you make contact, you hit a homerun, because why would any other hit matter?

Miss an input?  Strike.  Wrong input?  Strike.  Didn't get 'em all right?  Strike.  3 Strikes?  New batter, record reset.

All assets are open-source except for that one... you know the one.
